properties.name: telegram.bot.username
properties.description: Telegram bot username used for deep links

properties.name: telegram.deep-link-base
properties.description: Base URL for Telegram deep links

properties.name: telegram.link.ttl-minutes
properties.description: Lifetime in minutes for Telegram link tokens

properties.name: telegram.link.max-active-tokens
properties.description: Maximum number of active Telegram link tokens per user

properties.name: telegram.notifications.default-enabled
properties.description: Whether Telegram notifications are enabled immediately after linking
